alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:17AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches expected between 5000 to 5500 feet and up to 6 inches above 5500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph early in the afternoon, decreasing to 20-25 mph by late afternoon and lasting through Sunday night. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
